scenes.background: Monica looks at Bob, who is pacing anxiously.
scenes.description: We need to decide now. We can't keep delaying!

options.text: Let's weigh the pros and cons quickly and then decide.
options.analysis: You suggested a balanced approach, encouraging quick yet thoughtful decision-making, showing good emotional perception and self-regulation.

options.text: We should follow the process to avoid mistakes, even if it takes time.
options.analysis: You advocated for thorough planning, showing strong self-regulation and social skills but less empathy towards urgency.

options.text: Maybe this isn't the best time to make a decision. Let's revisit this later.
options.analysis: You suggested delaying the decision, showing good motivation to avoid mistakes but less self-regulation in handling the situation promptly.
